Comments_List: It is a good introduction to ethical philosophy and theory with a focus on military leadership.
I really enjoyed the case studies and personal anecdotes.

The clas swas definitely more interesting and better than other Rotc classes Ive taken. Maybe having debates based on different moral philosophies could make it a bit more engaging? Although the case studies definitely helped.
If youre a senior in NROTC youre taking it. If not, it is interesting and worth the time but you wont get credit which is unfortunate. If youre interested though check it out.
